Only valid these travel dates. Some closeouts, date & flight restrictions may apply. Maximum stay of 21 days. Prices are based on Aircalin Economy Class airfares ex Auckland. Surcharges apply for travel from Wellington, Christchurch, Queenstown or Dunedin via Auckland on Jetstar. Subject to Jetstar availability and flight schedules. Fares may not be available on all services. Change and cancellation fees apply once ticketed. Note: Travel is subject to government entry requirements at time of travel. *It is our policy to present the cost of our flights & holidays inclusive of all airport and government charges. Please accept however that these charges are not within our control, therefore we reserve the right to pass on any increase.
